localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: There's an abundance of sources available for hearing the trending, breaking news updates. We keep you informed on the stories that don't make it to the front page, for free.
blogPost.body: There's an abundance of sources available for hearing the trending, breaking news updates. We keep you informed on the stories that don't make it to the front page, for free.
blogPost.title: Below the Fold - News you aren’t hearing anywhere else
blogPost.author: Anum Hussain

localize.description: 有丰富的消息来源，可以听到最新的趋势，突发新闻。我们让你了解那些没有上头版的故事，免费的。
localize.tagline: 你在其他地方听不到的新闻

localize.description: 有豐富的消息來源，可以聽到最新的趨勢，突發新聞。我們讓你瞭解那些沒有上頭版的故事，免費的。
localize.tagline: 你在其他地方聽不到的新聞

previous.excerpt: Stop wasting time to recreate the same things to manage your projects every time. With Notion PM you have everything already done: document binder, contacts, stages, roadmap, tasks, and page templates. One-click. 3 different styles with more than 200 assets.
previous.title: Notion PM - The perfect workspace to manage projects with your clients

localize.description: 不要再浪费时间去重新创建同样的东西来管理你的项目。有了Notion PM，你已经拥有了一切：文件夹、联系人、阶段、路线图、任务和页面模板。一键式。3种不同的风格，200多种资产。
localize.tagline: 与客户一起管理项目的完美工作空间。

localize.description: 不要再浪費時間去重新創建同樣的東西來管理你的項目。有了Notion PM，你已經擁有了一切：文件夾、聯繫人、階段、路線圖、任務和頁面模板。一鍵式。3種不同的風格，200多種資產。
localize.tagline: 與客戶一起管理項目的完美工作空間。
